BasicInfo.short: OORT designs and manufactures hardware and software solutions which enable customers to turn their home or office into a smart one.

Products.name: OORT SmartHub
Products.description: It's a heart of the intelligent ecosystem, which can interact with all bluetooth devices and allows to control the home from any place.

Products.name: OORT SmartSocket
Products.description: Intelligent outlet which enables you to turn all appliances connected to it on or off with an easy-to-use, free app on your smartphone.

Products.name: OORT SmartFinder
Products.description: A device that lets users easily track down their lost items. Attach it to keys or a wallet and locate the lost or missing items via app.

Products.name: OORT SmartLED
Products.description: smart light bulb which you can control via free mobile app to switch on or off a light or change its color from another room.
